coreAttributes.name: Pan's Flute
coreAttributes.description: A thick glass bottle containing a type of high-quality champagne. The bottle's label declares it to be of the brand 'Pan's Flute', which seems to refer both to the name of a champagne glass and to the brand's symbol of a pan flute.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A soothing wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)] [#npc.incrementAlcoholLevel(0.15)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: After releasing the cork with a loud bang, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the glass bottle of Pan's Flute up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth]. Tilting [npc.her] head back, [npc.she] [npc.verb(start)] drinking the bubbly champagne, and [npc.is] very pleased to discover that it has a truly excellent taste.
useDescriptions.otherUse: After releasing the cork with a loud bang, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the glass bottle of Pan's Flute up to [npc2.namePos] waiting [npc2.lips]. Tilting [npc2.her] head back, [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(start)] drinking the bubbly champagne, and [npc2.is] very pleased to discover that it has a truly excellent taste.
